00054 void CBibleReadWindow::applyProfileSettings( CProfileWindow* const settings ) {
00055     CLexiconReadWindow::applyProfileSettings(settings);
00056 
00057     const int count = displaySettingsButton()->menuItemCount();
00058     int result = settings->windowSettings();
00059 //  qWarning("count == %i", count);
00060     for (int i = count-1; i>=1; i--) {
00061         if (result-(int)pow(2,i-1)>= 0) { //2^i was added before, so item with index i is set
00062             result -= (int)pow(2,i-1);
00063 //          qWarning("set item %i to true", i);
00064             displaySettingsButton()->setItemStatus(i,true);
00065         }
00066         else {
00067 //          qWarning("set item %i to false", i);
00068             displaySettingsButton()->setItemStatus(i,false);            
00069     }
00070     }       
00071     displaySettingsButton()->setChanged();
00072 };
00073 
00074 void CBibleReadWindow::storeProfileSettings( CProfileWindow* const settings ) {
00075     CLexiconReadWindow::storeProfileSettings(settings);
00076 
00077     const int count = displaySettingsButton()->menuItemCount();
00078     int result = 0;
00079     //now check every item
00080     for (int i = 1; i < count; i++) { //first item is a title
00081         if (displaySettingsButton()->itemStatus(i)) //item is checked
00082             result += (int)pow(2,i-1);//add 2^i (the i. digit in binary)
00083     }
00084     settings->setWindowSettings(result);
00085 };

00089 void CBibleReadWindow::insertKeyboardActions( KAccel* const a ){
00090   a->insert("Next book",        i18n("Next book"),        "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_BOOK,        0, "");
00091     a->insert("Previous book",    i18n("Previous book"),    "", IDK_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_BOOK,    0, "");
00092     a->insert("Next chapter",     i18n("Next chapter"),     "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_CHAPTER,     0, "");
00093     a->insert("Previous chapter", i18n("Previous chapter"), "", IDK_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_CHAPTER, 0, ""); 
00094     a->insert("Next verse",       i18n("Next verse"),       "", IDK_PRESENTER_NEXT_VERSE,       0, "");
00095     a->insert("Previous verse",   i18n("Previous verse"),   "", IDK_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_VERSE,   0, ""); 
00096 }

00098 
00099 void CBibleReadWindow::initKeyboardActions() {
00100   CReadWindow::initKeyboardActions();
00101 
00102   CBTConfig::setupAccel( CBTConfig::bibleWindow, accel() ); 
00103   insertKeyboardActions( accel() );
00104 
00105   accel()->readSettings();
00106 
00107     accel()->setSlot("Next book", this, SLOT(nextBook()));
00108   accel()->setSlot("Previous book", this, SLOT(previousBook()));
00109   accel()->setSlot("Next chapter", this, SLOT(nextChapter()));      
00110   accel()->setSlot("Previous chapter", this, SLOT(previousChapter()));  
00111   accel()->setSlot("Next verse", this, SLOT(nextVerse()));      
00112   accel()->setSlot("Previous verse", this, SLOT(previousVerse()));  
00113 }

00115 void CBibleReadWindow::initConnections(){
00116   CLexiconReadWindow::initConnections();
00117   connect(keyChooser(), SIGNAL(keyChanged(CSwordKey*)), this, SLOT(keyChanged(CSwordKey*)));
00118 }

00120 void CBibleReadWindow::initView(){
00121 //  qWarning("CBibleWindow::initView");
00122     CLexiconReadWindow::initView();
00123     
00124   setDisplaySettingsButton( new CDisplaySettingsButton( &displayOptions(), &filterOptions(), modules(), mainToolBar()) );
00125     mainToolBar()->insertWidget(1,displaySettingsButton()->size().width(),displaySettingsButton());
00126 
00127     if (backend()->isICU){
00128       CTransliterationButton* trb = new CTransliterationButton(mainToolBar());
00129         mainToolBar()->insertWidget(2,trb->size().width(),trb);
00130     }
00131 }

00134 void CBibleReadWindow::setupPopupMenu(){
00135 //  qWarning("CBibleReadWindow::setupPopupMenu()");
00136     popup()->insertTitle(CToolClass::getIconForModule(modules().first()), i18n("Bible window"));
00137 
00138     m_actions.selectAll = new KAction(i18n("Select all"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(selectAll()), actionCollection());
00139   m_actions.selectAll->plug(popup());
00140 
00141   (new KActionSeparator())->plug( popup() );
00142 
00143     m_actions.copyMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Copy..."), ICON_EDIT_COPY);  
00144     m_actions.copy.referenceOnly = new KAction(i18n("Reference"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorOnly()), actionCollection());
00145     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.referenceOnly);
00146     m_actions.copy.referenceTextOnly = new KAction(i18n("Text of reference"), KShortcut(0),displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorTextOnly()), actionCollection());    
00147     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.referenceTextOnly);
00148     m_actions.copy.referenceAndText = new KAction(i18n("Reference with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00149     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.referenceAndText);    
00150     m_actions.copy.chapter = new KAction(i18n("Chapter"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copyAll()), actionCollection());
00151     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.chapter);     
00152   m_actions.copyMenu->insert(new KActionSeparator());   
00153     m_actions.copy.selectedText = new KAction(i18n("Selected text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copySelection()),actionCollection());
00154     m_actions.copyMenu->insert(m_actions.copy.selectedText);
00155     m_actions.copyMenu->plug(popup());
00156 
00157     m_actions.saveMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Save..."),ICON_FILE_SAVE);   
00158     m_actions.save.referenceAndText = new KAction(i18n("Reference with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00159     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.referenceAndText);
00160     m_actions.save.chapterAsPlain = new KAction(i18n("Chapter as plain text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAsPlain()),actionCollection());
00161     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.chapterAsPlain);
00162     m_actions.save.chapterAsHTML = new KAction(i18n("Chapter as HTML"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(saveAsHTML()),actionCollection());
00163     m_actions.saveMenu->insert(m_actions.save.chapterAsHTML);
00164     m_actions.saveMenu->plug(popup());
00165 
00166     m_actions.printMenu = new KActionMenu(i18n("Print..."),ICON_FILE_PRINT);    
00167     m_actions.print.reference = new KAction(i18n("Reference with text"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(printAnchorWithText()), actionCollection());
00168     m_actions.printMenu->insert(m_actions.print.reference);     
00169   m_actions.print.chapter = new KAction(i18n("Chapter"), KShortcut(0), displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(printAll()),actionCollection());
00170     m_actions.printMenu->insert(m_actions.print.chapter);
00171     m_actions.printMenu->plug(popup());
00172 }

00175 void CBibleReadWindow::updatePopupMenu(){
00176 //  qWarning("CBibleReadWindow::updatePopupMenu()");
00177 
00178   m_actions.copy.referenceOnly->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );   
00179     m_actions.copy.referenceTextOnly->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() ); 
00180     m_actions.copy.referenceAndText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00181     m_actions.copy.selectedText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasSelection() );
00182 
00183     m_actions.save.referenceAndText->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00184     
00185   m_actions.print.reference->setEnabled( displayWidget()->hasActiveAnchor() );
00186 }

00189 void CBibleReadWindow::nextBook(){
00190     if (verseKey()->next(CSwordVerseKey::UseBook))
00191         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00192 }
00193 
00195 void CBibleReadWindow::previousBook(){
00196     if (verseKey()->previous(CSwordVerseKey::UseBook))
00197         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00198 }
00199 
00201 void CBibleReadWindow::nextChapter(){
00202     if (verseKey()->next(CSwordVerseKey::UseChapter))
00203         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00204 }
00205 
00207 void CBibleReadWindow::previousChapter(){
00208     if (verseKey()->previous(CSwordVerseKey::UseChapter))
00209         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00210 }

00213 void CBibleReadWindow::nextVerse(){
00214     if (verseKey()->next(CSwordVerseKey::UseVerse))
00215         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00216 }
00217 
00219 void CBibleReadWindow::previousVerse(){
00220     if (verseKey()->previous(CSwordVerseKey::UseVerse))
00221         keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00222 }

00225 CSwordVerseKey* CBibleReadWindow::verseKey(){
00226 //  qWarning("CBibleReadWindow::key()");
00227     CSwordVerseKey* k = dynamic_cast<CSwordVerseKey*>(CDisplayWindow::key());
00228     Q_ASSERT(k);
00229     return k;
00230 }
00231 
00233 void CBibleReadWindow::keyChanged(CSwordKey* key){
00234     QWidgetList windows = mdi()->windowList();  
00235     if (!windows.count())
00236         return; 
00237 
00238     for (windows.first(); windows.current(); windows.next()) {
00239         if (CCommentaryReadWindow* p = dynamic_cast<CCommentaryReadWindow*>(windows.current()))
00240             p->syncToKey(key);
00241     }   
00242 }
